attributes.action: put a stop to youth gangs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ask the Prime Minister to do something about youth gangs in the UK. These dangerous, aggressive, unpleasant kids do absolutely nothing to contribute to (in fact, only detract from)society. Some tough love is needed. This petition is to ask the Prime Minister to use some tough love and make sure these kids do not grow up to produce another generation of murderers and drug dealers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
